lead_paragraph: Stewart Cink was swinging and thinking well yesterday during the first round of the Colonial in Fort Worth. Combined with an uncharacteristic light breeze on a pristine course, the result was predictable — a six-under 64.A stroke back at 65 were Bubba Watson, Zach Johnson, Arron Oberholser, Charley Hoffman and Stephen Ames. The defending champion, Kenny Perry, was among eight players at 66.
